pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Den-O (2007, TV show)$(br)Health: 30

Spawns within a $(l:den_o/structures/denliner_gouka)DenLiner Gouka$(/l)$(br2)Tamed with $(l:misc/items/foods#vienna_coffee)Vienna Coffee$(/l) or $(l:misc/items/foods#pudding)Pudding$(/l)$(br2)Right-click with a $(l:den_o/arsenal/rider_pass)Rider Pass$(/l) while tamed to transform into $(l:den_o/riders/den_o#sword)Kamen Rider Den-O Sword Form$(/l)$(br2)Drops$(li)1-3 $(l:den_o/items/imagin_sand)Imagin Sand$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:den_o/items/rider_tickets#rider_ticket_sword)Rider Ticket Momotaros$(/l) (10%)
